Experience

Mushara Bush Camp is located just 10km from the Von Lindequist Gate on the eastern boundary of Etosha National Park in northern Namibia.
An ideal base for visitors to the reserve, Mushara Bush Camp welcomes families with children of all ages. Friendly & hospitable staff will go out of their way to make your stay special.
The name Mushara is derived from the Purple Pod Terminalia tree which grows abundantly on the lodge grounds & in the surroundings.

Stay

Mushara Bush Camp consists of 12 tents & 4 family units sleeping 2 adults & 3 children each.
Each of the en-suite tents is built from canvas, wood & local limestone. The very spacious private verandah allows for quiet afternoon reading & the shower offers beautiful views of the surrounding bush.
The main house is thatched & has a true bush camp feel to it. Drinks are often served around the campfire where stories are shared & friendships are formed. All meals are served under the thatched verandah with the bush being a mere step away.

Activities

Guided game drives are led by experienced rangers. Each day guests will experience fascinating perspectives of wildlife in Etosha. The vehicles are spacious & offer 360-degree unobstructed views from the elevated seats.
A special play area for children includes books, games, toys, drawing utensils creative games & very friendly childminders who are happy to keep your children busy.
There is also a play park outside with a jungle gym, an old tractor, a sandpit & a kiddies pool.

subfolders.title: Andersson's At Ongava
subfolders.description: Andersson’s at Ongava is located in one of Africa’s largest game reserves – the Etosha National Park in Northern Namibia.   This family-friendly camp offers sensational waterhole game viewing, with frequent sightings of the famous white & black rhino, amongst a variety of other game.

subfolders.title: Little Ongava
subfolders.description: Little Ongava is one of Namibia’s most luxurious & exclusive safari camps.  Built on a rocky outcrop in the Ongava Game Reserve to the south of Etosha, the lodge provides awe-inspiring views over the reserve. The Etosha National Park is one of Africa’s largest game parks & boasts a variety of wildlife & large herds of plains game.  The elusive black rhino can also be found here.

An ideal base for visitors to the reserve, Mushara Bush Camp welcomes families with children of all ages.  Friendly & hospitable staff will go out of their way to make your stay special.

subfolders.title: Mushara Lodge
subfolders.description: Mushara Lodge is located just 10km from the Von Lindequist Gate on the eastern boundary of Etosha National Park in northern Namibia.   An ideal overnight stop for visitors to the reserve, Mushara Lodge welcomes families with children of all ages.  Friendly & hospitable staff will go out of their way to make your stay special.

subfolders.title: Mushara Outpost
subfolders.description: Mushara Outpost is located just 10km from the Von Lindequist Gate on the eastern boundary of Etosha National Park in northern Namibia.   An ideal base for visitors to the reserve, Mushara Outpost is a luxurious tented camp that is loved by honeymooners or couples looking for peace & tranquillity.  The camp does not allow children under the age of 12.

subfolders.title: Ongava Lodge
subfolders.description: Ongava Lodge is built on a small hill in the Ongava Game Reserve against the southern boundary of the world-renowned Etosha National Park in Namibia. Offering splendid views over an active waterhole, guests can enjoy a host of thirsty wildlife from the main viewing deck.

subfolders.title: Ongava Tented Camp
subfolders.description: Ongava Tented Camp is one of Namibia’s hidden gems.  Located in the Ongava Game Reserve to the south of the Etosha National Park, it overlooks a nearby waterhole. Similar in size to Switzerland, The Etosha National Park is one of Africa’s largest game reserves & is famous for its excellent waterhole game viewing.

subfolders.title: Onguma Bush Camp
subfolders.description: In the middle of the bush in Etosha’s Onguma Game Reserve, you will find Onguma Bush Camp – renowned for its excellent waterhole game viewing & family-friendly safaris. The reserve covers an area of over 34,000 hectares of savanna, bushveld & dry pan, offering over 30 different animal species.  Plains game roam freely on the reserve & predators are common residents in the area.

subfolders.title: Onguma Etosha Aoba Camp
subfolders.description: Onguma Etosha Aoba Camp is set within the Onguma Game Reserve in the Etosha National Park – renowned for its excellent waterhole game viewing & white rhino tracking adventures. The reserve covers an area of over 34,000 hectares of savanna, bushveld & dry pan, offering over 30 different animal species.  Plains game roam freely on the reserve & predators are common residents in the area.

subfolders.title: Onguma Tented Camp
subfolders.description: Onguma Tented Camp is situated in the famous Onguma Game Reserve & forms part of the world-renowned Etosha National Park in Northern Namibia. The reserve covers an area of over 34,000 hectares of savanna, bushveld & dry pan, offering over 30 different animal species.  Plains game roam freely on the reserve & predators are common residents in the area.

subfolders.title: Onguma The Fort
subfolders.description: Onguma The Fort is situated within the Onguma Game Reserve in the Etosha National Park – renowned for its excellent waterhole game viewing & home to the elusive black rhino. The reserve covers an area of over 34,000 hectares of savanna, bushveld & dry pan, offering over 30 different animal species.  Plains game roam freely on the reserve & predators are common residents in the area.

subfolders.title: Onguma Tree Top Camp
subfolders.description: In the heart of the Onguma Game Reserve in Etosha, you will find Onguma Tree Top Camp – renowned for its excellent waterhole game viewing & rhino tracking adventures. The reserve covers an area of over 34,000 hectares of savanna, bushveld & dry pan, offering over 30 different animal species.  Plains game roam freely on the reserve & predators are common residents in the area.

subfolders.title: Safarihoek Lodge
subfolders.description: Set on a hill in the exclusive Etosha Heights Private Reserve, bordering the world-renowned Etosha National Park, lies Safarihoek Lodge. With uninterrupted views of the rugged yet beautiful landscape & roaming wildlife, Safarihoek Lodge is a favourite among many travellers.

subfolders.title: Villa Mushara
subfolders.description: The exclusive Villa Mushara consists of 2 stylish one-bedroom villas & is located a mere 8 km from the bustling Etosha National Park’s eastern gate – thus allowing the best of both worlds. Individually decorated, the 2 stylish villas offer a tranquil safari experience in the lap of luxury, making this an ideal choice for honeymooners or couples.
